main.name: Robert Peltekov
main.occupation: Developer Consultant in Blockchain at Berkeley
main.description: I am currently looking for any and all opportunities to work in software!
main.bio: I am a first year UC Berkeley student dual majoring in EECS and Business Administration as part of the Berkeley Management, Entreprenuership, and Technology program. I have a wide passion for not only building and developing cool projects, but bringing them and their underlying ideas to the public.
main.contactmessage: I would love to talk with you about anything!

work.title: Ground Systems Software Development Intern
work.description: Designed and implemented ground system antenna cost models conserving company time and resources. Maintained and handled Boeing proprietary software and add to capabilities. Delivered solutions to supervising engineers at meetings learning business operations and conduct.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
